tool_description: Manages A/B tests for checkout optimization, including test setup, user assignment, and statistical significance analysis.

test_name.description: Unique name for the A/B test

test_type.description: Type of test: checkout_flow, email_template, pricing, ui_element

traffic_allocation.description: Percentage of traffic to include in test (10-100)

success_metric.description: Primary success metric: conversion_rate, revenue_per_visitor, cart_completion

error_messages: Invalid test_name: Must be a non-empty, unique string
Invalid test_type: Must be one of [checkout_flow, email_template, pricing, ui_element]
Invalid traffic_allocation: Must be between 10 and 100
Invalid control_variant: Must be a valid configuration string
Invalid test_variants: Must contain 1-4 valid variant configurations
Invalid success_metric: Must be one of [conversion_rate, revenue_per_visitor, cart_completion]
Invalid minimum_sample_size: Must be at least 100
Invalid significance_level: Must be between 0.01 and 0.1
Invalid test_duration_days: Must be between 1 and 90 days
usage: Set up A/B tests by defining test parameters, variants, and success metrics. The tool manages user assignment and tracks statistical significance.

test_id.description: Unique identifier for the created test

test_status.description: Current test status: setup, running, completed, stopped
